propDescriptions.badgeContent: The content rendered within the badge.
propDescriptions.badgeInset: The inset of the badge. Support shorthand syntax as described in https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inset.
propDescriptions.children: The badge will be added relative to this node.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.showZero: Controls whether the badge is hidden when badgeContent is zero.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
